title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties: Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, making them appear as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out even more.
EB: The text fields should be created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. This change is necessary in order to prevent the fields from having automatic borders and different colored backgrounds. It seems this is done so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
